fix.after:
match data:
    case {"_ansible_verbose_override": _}:
        data = "omitted"
    case dict() as d:
        d = d.copy()
        invocation = d.pop("invocation", None)
        payload = json.dumps(d)
        match invocation:
            case None:
                data = payload
            case _:
                data = json.dumps(invocation) + " => %s " % payload
